ModMetaData.name: Rimworld Search Agency (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: DoctorVanGogh, Killface, meonester, HawnHan
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of DoctorVanGogh, Killface, meonester, HawnHans mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=726479594
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/StorageSearch][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] This Mod allows you to search by name in various filters:
+ Storage tab + Bill tab + Outfit tab
Original A12 version by meonester. Initial update for A13–A17 by Killface. Mod menu, rewrites for Harmony and massive improvements by DoctorVanGogh
Includes Hauling Hysteresis by Vendan https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=26958.0
External download link: https://github.com/Killface1980/StorageSearch
